Description: Information about the project(s) stored in this PMO.
Details on the individual specimen collected.
Example fields: specimen_taxon_id, collection_date, collection_country, host_age, host_sex, specimen_collect_device

Description: Details on the genomes that targets refer to.
Details of individual targets that make up panel(s) within PMO.
The collection of targets, optionally grouped by reaction, that were amplified and sequenced.
Details of the assay for the batch of samples sequenced together.
Details of the assay(s) performed on an individual specimen to go from the specimen taken from the patient to the sequencing data.
Details of the bioinformatics pipeline/methods used to generate the microhaplotypes.
Example fields: demultiplexing_method, denoising_method, additional_methods All methods include;  program_version, program

Description: Runtime information for the batches processed by a bioinformatics method.
Information on all of the microhaplotypes found within the population/ samples included in the PMO.
For each library_sample, the microhaplotypes that were detected in that sample.
The read counts per sample at different stages within the bioinformatics method/ pipeline.
